Fall down seven times, stand up eight.
@kpedraja I think we have put all of our eggs in thinking about laws and votes and elections and I think it's bigger than that.
I don't know what else to do, but lord have mercy on everything holy if we don't put the kabosh on the mania and bs and lies from this clown
Let me tell y'all, I'm a gay black man in a str8 world; my entire life has been an act of protest. I wake up protesting. I live protest.
Play nice while he is undoing everything this country has ever done from the inside; if y'all don't start snatching tufts of blond tracks...
And I'm done with being polite and respectful and kind; lives are at stake. I'm going to need MY reps and elected officials to come thru.
People need to wake up, look deeper, and not be baited by what's on the surface. Democracy and our country is at stake.
Of course, I also think all of this is a ruse for ole man B, and that his propensity to set the world on fire is the real issue.
I still think, despite the last week, that is policies will fail, his presidency will implode, and we'll be on the right side of history.
Tired of politicians spouting their outrage and fury on Sunday shows. I'ma need them to buck up and come through with that two-piece.
